entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ILLink_links_simple_app_without_analysis_warnings_and_it_runs failing in 8.0.1xx #40882
  • Support a new launch profile type to launch the project in a container #40880
  • Many tools in the SDK repo are producing packages #40871
  • DotNet Publish, specify versions as parameter won't reflected in MSIX #40879
  • Unexpected NETSDK1210 after removing TFM #40870
  • Download cmake failure when running restore.cmd #40859
  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64]After installing net9preview4SDK on the arm64OS, create the MStest project and run dotnet test. The generated log is x64. #40857
  • .NET SDK 6.0.421 (x64) keeps asking to make changes to my device #40856

Closed

  • Root .resources.dll from transitive PackageReference not copied to build output #40834
    9.0.1xx
  • [Workload Sets] ensure that users can get a full listing of all installed workloads (including multiple versions) #37828
  • Update logic for how workload version is displayed #40005
  • `--no-restore` should specify `-restore:false` when calling MSBuild to override response file arguments #39821
    9.0.1xx
  • .NET 8.0 error NU1101: Unable to find package Microsoft.NETCore.App.Host.ubuntu.22.04-x64. No packages exist with this id in source(s): nuget.org #40676
  • Workload ID maui-android is not recognized #38171
    Discussion
  • Not able to install MAUI on ArchLinux system #40576

PullRequests

Created

  • Add back missing PGO properties after installer->sdk repo consolidation #40886
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #40885
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #40884
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Backport PR to use latest MSBuild on core #40883
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #40881
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #40875
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #40874
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #40876
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.3xx #40872
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #40824
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Have --no-restore imply -restore:false to override any response file command-line arguments #40579
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Reference latest MSBuild for netcore MSBuild stuff #40603
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Port changes from VS where we stopped using custom tracing event arguments class based on BinaryFormatter #40849
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Fix DisableWorkloadResolverSentinelPath on .NET Framework #40787
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [VMR] Skip Publish Scenario Test Results for dev versions job #40860
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Don't force base image manifests to have a mediaType #40776
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Refactor workload set and workload install/update logic #39991
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
